ddl:
CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.openaq.global_air_quality`
(
  location STRING,
  city STRING,
  country STRING,
  pollutant STRING,
  value FLOAT64,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  unit STRING,
  source_name STRING,
  latitude FLOAT64,
  longitude FLOAT64,
  averaged_over_in_hours FLOAT64,
  location_geom GEOGRAPHY
);
